summary: A simple recolour of the Glass armour and weapons. The base metal is black, the glass parts are blue with a green shine.
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------
Description:

A simple recolour of the Glass armour and weapons. The base metal is black, the glass parts are blue with a green shine.

-------------------------------------------------------
Version history:

1.0 - Release
1.0 - Uploaded images
1.0 - Updated readme and description
-------------------------------------------------------
Credits/tools used:

Bethesda - skyrim, and the original textures of course
DDS Converter 2 - texture conversion so i could edit it.
Gimp 2.0 - editor used for the textures
Unknown name - for the green shine effect
-------------------------------------------------------
Installation:

Using NMM
Add the archive to your modlist and activate it.

Using WinRAR or 7-Zip (or another archive too)
Extract to the data folder. This is usually located in C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/Steamapps/common/Skyrim/data on Windows 7 and vista. On Widows XP it should follow the same path, but will not include the (x86) tag.
-------------------------------------------------------
Uninstallation:

Using NMM
Deactivate in your modlist if you still want to keep the
mod, or press delete if you want to remove it permanently

Using WinRAR or 7-Zip (or another archive too)
Delete the files originally extracted to your data folder.

These are:

textures/armor/glass/f/cuirass.dds
textures/armor/glass/f/cuirassenvmask.dds

textures/armor/glass/m/boots.dds
textures/armor/glass/m/bootsenvmask.dds
textures/armor/glass/m/cuirass.dds

textures/armor/glass/m/gauntletenvmask.dds

textures/armor/glass/m/helmetenvmask.dds

textures/armor/glass/shield/shield.dds
textures/armor/glass/shield/shield_n.dds

textures/armor/glass/shield/shieldenvmask.dds

textures/weapons/glass/glassarrow.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glassbattleaxe.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glassbattleaxe_envmask.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glassbow.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glassbow_envmask.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glassdagger.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glassdagger_envmapmask.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glassgreatsword.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glassgreatsword_envmask.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glasshammer.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glasshammer_envmask.dds
textures/weapons/glass/glasshandaxe.dds
